00066   class Tuxedo {
00067 public:
00068     Tuxedo ();
00069     virtual ~Tuxedo() ;
00070 
00071     /* Method moved into the constructor of AbstractClient
00072      * init() allows a client to join a BEA Tuxedo ATMI system application. Before a client can
00073      * use any of the BEA Tuxedo ATMI system communication or transaction routines, it can
00074      * first join a BEA Tuxedo ATMI system application by explicitly using tpinit or implicitly by
00075      * issuing a service request (or any ATMI function). In the later case, the tpinit() function is
00076      * called by the BEA Tuxedo system on behalf of the client with the tpinfo argument set to NULL.
00077      *
00078      * @param cltname client program name
00079      * @param usr user name
00080      * @param passwd user's password.
00081      *  int init ( char *cltname = NULL, char *usr = NULL, char *passwd = NULL) ;
00082      */
00083 
00084     /* Method moved into the destructor of AbstractClient
00085      * End any pending operation and free any alloated ressource. After this call any attempt at
00086      * using ATMI will fail.
00087      * int term () ;
00088      */
00089 
00119     char *allocate ( char *type, char *subtype, long size );
00120 
00128     char *extend ( char *buffer, long extent );
00129 
00133     void free ( char *buffer );

00160       return errorno;

00164     };

00196       Tuxedo::set (this->flags, flags);
